sect1.title: Installing Sed-&sed-version;
sect1.para: The Sed package contains a stream editor.
For its installation Sed depends on: Bash, Binutils, Coreutils, Diffutils, GCC, Gettext, Glibc, Grep, Make, Texinfo.

sect2.title: Installation of Sed
sect2.para: To have the results tested, issue: make check.

sect2.title: Short description
sect2.para: sed is used to filter and transform text files in a single pass.
